con:testCase.name: BMUserCreateBankUserUpdateNegativecase
con:testCase.con:description: Bank user who doesn't have update permission is trying to update payment which was created by BM user.

con:config.con:query: select CUSTOMERID,ACCOUNTNUMBER,FIRSTNAME,CURRENCY from V_authorisation where CUSTBANKID='4201' and CURRENCY = 'NOK' and length(customerID)='11' and ROWNUM=1
